articles.description: The Blazers pushed the Shaq and Kobe Lakers, but were they really tougher than the Kings? Shaq and Robert Horry think so.
articles.content: Back during the years when Shaquille ONeal and Kobe Bryant were leading the Los Angeles Lakers, the purple and gold had multiple memorable playoff battles with Chris Webber, Vlade Divac, Mike Bibby a… [+4958 chars]

articles.author: Scott Gleeson
articles.title: Five bold predictions for the long-awaited return of the NBA playoffs - USA TODAY
articles.description: The NBA has a plan in place to finish the regular season and playoffs. But after such a long layoff, fans should expect some chaos.
articles.content:
Sure, some sports are back. But "sports" as we know them are largely still on pause due to the coronavirus pandemic. Today is Day 87 without sports. 
The NBA playoffs will give sports fans a smorgas… [+5049 chars]
